title: Build a Train Consist
description: A yard planner needs to create a consist (a list of locomotives and railcars) for a new outbound train.

tasks.description: Create a new train ID for the scheduled departure.
tasks.expected_outcome: A new train record is created.

tasks.description: Assign two locomotives from the available power pool to the train.
Add a list of 85 railcars to the train consist in the correct sequence.
tasks.expected_outcome: All railcars are added to the train record.

tasks.description: Validate the train consist for length and weight against track restrictions for the planned route.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system confirms the train is within the limits for its route.
